__SqlaTable__.sql:
SELECT FILE_NAME
	,STATUS
	,LAST_LOAD_TIME
	,ROW_COUNT
	,FILE_SIZE
FROM snowpipe__copy_history
WHERE STATUS = 'Load failed';

SELECT LOAD_DATE AS LOAD_DATE
	,STATUS
	,count(1) AS "Total no of files"
	,sum(row_count) AS "Total no of records"
	,sum(file_size) AS "Total file size(bytes)"
	,"Total file size(bytes)"/(1024*1024*1024) as "Total file size(gb)"
FROM snowpipe__copy_history
GROUP BY LOAD_DATE ,STATUS
